rules_text: When this creature enters, create an implant token with a shield counter. Then surveil X, where X is the number of kinds of counters among permanents you control. [i](It’s a token artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery”)[/i]
